column1: SID-2000001#Suspicious SSH Brute Force Attempt#Suricata#TCP#22#High#Authentication Attack#Detects excessive SSH login attempts from a single source#"alert tcp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET 22 (msg:""Suspicious SSH Brute Force""

SID-2000002#SQL Injection Attack Detection#OWASP CRS#TCP#80,443#Critical#Web Attack#Detects SQL injection patterns in HTTP requests#"alert http $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:""SQL Injection Attack""
SID-2000003#Port Scanning Activity Detected#Snort#TCP#any#Medium#Reconnaissance#Detects port scanning attempts using SYN packets#"alert tcp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:""Port Scanning""
column4: threshold: type by_src, track by_src, count 20, seconds 60

column1: SID-2000004#Malware C2 Communication Pattern#Alien Vault OTX#TCP#any#Critical#Malware#Detects known malware command and control server communication#"alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:""Malware C2 Communication""

SID-2000005#DNS Tunneling Detection#Snort#UDP#53#High#Data Exfiltration#Detects DNS query patterns consistent with DNS tunneling attacks#"alert dns $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET 53 (msg:""DNS Tunneling""
